import React from 'react'; import { Box, Heading, Text, Image, Icon, Center, HStack, Button, Flex, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import 'tachyons'; import { CheckIcon } from '@chakra-ui/icons'; import lightning from '../../images/icons/lightning.png'; import './Pricing.css'; import AOS from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; AOS.init(); export const PricingItem = (props) => { return (
{props.heading} {props.subHeading} Recommended {props.price}
); } const CheckerBox = (props) => { return ( [...Array(8)].map( (_,i) => )); } export const PricingTable = () => { return ( Tersedia Recording Class/sesi Interactive Class melalui ZOOM Soft file Materi Pembelajaran 8 - 15 Siswa Per Kelas Qualified Teacher Tersedia Kelas Lanjutan E-Sertificate 8 Pertemuan (2 bulan)
) } const Pricing = () => { return (
Choose a learning plan that
speaks to you Flexible pricing plans for individuals and organizations — let's discuss your needs.
) } export default Pricing;
